column4: Hi all .. does anyone know of a good gdesklet like app (that makes the icon bar like "MacOS X") .. I've been playing with e-live e16 cd and it's got one that's just smooth .. ideas?
adesklets .. gotchya .. a'googaling I go .. thank you ..
do you know by chance if it'll be okay with Beryl/AIXGL/Nvidia going? .. I've found that FrostWire does not work with Beryl running ..
